{"rule":"A_NNS","sentence":"^\\QIn this system the material being accreted by V404 Cyngi A forms a accretion disk\\E$"}
{"rule":"A_NNS","sentence":"^\\QIn this system the material being accreted by V404 Cyngi A forms an accretion disk, greatly increasing the luminosity of the system.\\E$"}
